verses.verse: I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> with my whole heart. <S%H3820><s%> I will tell <S%H5608><s%> of all your marvelous works. <S%H6381><s%>
I will be glad <S%H8055><s%> and rejoice <S%H5970><s%> in you. <S%H2167><s%> I will sing praise to your name, <S%H8034><s%> O Most High. <S%H5945><s%>
When my enemies <S%H341><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> back, <S%H268><s%> they stumble <S%H3782><s%> and perish <S%H6><s%> in your presence. <S%H6440><s%>
For you have maintained <S%H6213><s%> my just <S%H4941><s%> cause. <S%H1779><s%> You sit <S%H3427><s%> on the throne <S%H3678><s%> judging <S%H8199><s%> righteously. <S%H6664><s%>

You have rebuked <S%H1605><s%> the nations. <S%H1471><s%> You have destroyed <S%H6><s%> the wicked. <S%H7563><s%> You have blotted out <S%H4229><s%> their name <S%H8034><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5769><s%>

The enemy <S%H341><s%> is overtaken <S%H2723><s%> by endless <S%H5331><s%> ruin. <S%H8552><s%> The very memory <S%H2143><s%> of the <S%H1992><s%> cities <S%H6145><s%> which you have overthrown <S%H5428><s%> has perished. <S%H6><s%>
But Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> reigns <S%H3427><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%> He has prepared <S%H3559><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> for judgment. <S%H4941><s%>
He will judge <S%H8199><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%> in righteousness. <S%H6664><s%> He will administer judgment <S%H1777><s%> to the peoples <S%H3816><s%> in uprightness. <S%H4339><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will also be a high tower <S%H4869><s%> for the oppressed; <S%H1790><s%> a high tower <S%H4869><s%> in times <S%H6256><s%> of trouble. <S%H6869><s%>
Those who know <S%H3045><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> will put their trust <S%H982><s%> in you, <S%H3068><s%> for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken <S%H5800><s%> those who seek you. <S%H1875><s%>
Sing praises <S%H2167><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who dwells <S%H3427><s%> in Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and declare <S%H5046><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%> what he has done. <S%H5949><s%>
For he who avenges <S%H1875><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> remembers <S%H2142><s%> them. <S%H7911><s%> He doesn't forget the cry <S%H6818><s%> of the afflicted. <S%H6035><s%>

Have mercy <S%H2603><s%> on me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh. See <S%H7200><s%> my affliction <S%H6040><s%> by those who hate <S%H8130><s%> me, <S%H7311><s%> and lift me up from the gates <S%H8179><s%> of death; <S%H4194><s%>

that I may show forth <S%H5608><s%> all your praise. <S%H8416><s%> In the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> I will rejoice <S%H1523><s%> in your salvation. <S%H3444><s%>

The nations <S%H1471><s%> have sunk down <S%H2883><s%> in the pit <S%H7845><s%> that they made. <S%H6213><s%> In the net <S%H7568><s%> which <S%H2098><s%> they hid, <S%H2934><s%> their own foot <S%H7272><s%> is taken. <S%H3920><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has made himself known. <S%H3045><s%> He has executed <S%H6213><s%> judgment. <S%H4941><s%> The wicked <S%H7563><s%> is snared <S%H5367><s%> by the work <S%H6467><s%> of his own hands. <S%H3709><s%> Meditation. <S%H1902><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be turned <S%H7725><s%> back to Sheol, <S%H7585><s%> even all the nations <S%H1471><s%> that forget <S%H7913><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>
For the needy <S%H34><s%> shall not always <S%H5331><s%> be forgotten, <S%H7911><s%> nor the hope <S%H8615><s%> of the poor <S%H6041><s%> perish <S%H6><s%> forever. <S%H5703><s%>
Arise, <S%H6965><s%> Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> Don't <S%H582><s%> let man prevail. <S%H5810><s%> Let the nations <S%H1471><s%> be judged <S%H8199><s%> in your sight. <S%H6440><s%>
Put <S%H7896><s%> them in fear, <S%H4172><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Let the nations <S%H1471><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> that they are only men. <S%H582><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
